TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed EventFieldTags extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Specifies the user-defined tag that is placed on fields of user-defined types that are passed as <see cref="T:System.Diagnostics.Tracing.EventSource"> payloads through the <xref:System.Diagnostics.Tracing.EventFieldAttribute>.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Diagnostics.Tracing.EventFieldTags None = int32(0)

Docs.summary: Specifies no tag and is equal to zero.
